thread.title: Rev Nick Shutt
thread.title_full: Enchanting Travels reviewed by Rev Nick Shutt

author: Rev Nick Shutt
title: Rev Nick Shutt
text: We were well looked after. There were a few hiccups along the way but they were dealt with and nothing we encountered spoiled our trip. In touring around, inevitably, you find yourself living out of the suitcase but every day is different and every day is filled with new experiences and encounters that make this type of holiday a real treat. If you want a beach holiday this isn't for you but if you want to get a taste of India then look no further.
